import React,{useState, useEffect }from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col ,Image, ListGroup, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' const SellerScreens = ({match}) => { const [seller, setSeller] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchSeller= async() =>{ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/sellers/${match.params.id}`) setSeller(data) } fetchSeller() }, [match]) return ( <> Go Back

{seller.name}

Professional as: â‚¹ {seller.occupation_type}

 Description: {seller.description} Address: {seller.address} ) } export default SellerScreens
